text:
Columbus deluxe
Caratteristiche generali
Software: Novomatic
Rulli: 5
Linee di vincita: 10
Puntata min.: 0,2 €
Puntata max.: 20 €
Max. di monete: 1
Vincita massima (Jackpot): 100.000 €
Autoplay: Si
Tema e grafica
Columbus Deluxe rappresenta la versione migliorata della storica slot machine della Novomatic Columbus. Il tema è lo stesso, così come i protagonisti, e si naviga anche qui in un mare di bonus e tesori alla scoperta del Nuovo Mondo.
Ciò che cambia rispetto alla precedente versione è certamente la grafica, che appare qui migliorata e resa più moderna, senza però rinunciare ad alcune caratteristiche che la rendono vicina alla tradizione delle slot machine terrestri, come i simboli che rappresentano le carte dal 9 all’Asso.
Simboli, Bonus e Scatter
I simboli sono incentrati sul tema della scoperta del Nuovo Continente: abbiamo la Regina Isabella di Spagna, le tre caravelle dell’esploratore, ma anche una collana d’oro e l’albero di una nave, nonché le carte da poker dal 9 all’Asso.
L’immagine di Cristoforo Colombo è il simbolo Wild, che non solo sostituisce tutti gli altri simboli, ma se appare dalle due volte in su, offre dei ricchi moltiplicatori, fino ad arrivare al montepremi di 100.000 € se compare cinque volte su una singola payline.
Le Caravelle sono lo Scatter e attivano il Bonus Free Spins; è presente anche la funzione Gamble per tentare il raddoppio della vincita.
Come giocare a Columbus Deluxe
Questa slot machine firmata Novomatic rappresenta un’evoluzione rispetto alla precedente versione anche dal punto di vista delle possibilità di gioco.
I simboli hanno ciascuno un valore diverso, partendo da quelli che offrono la vincita inferiore (le carte da gioco), fino ad arrivare a quelli che pagano di più, rappresentati dalla regina Isabella D’Aragona e da Cristoforo Colombo in persona.
Una volta che, attraverso gli Scatter, si ha l’accesso ai giri gratuiti, gli stessi simboli Scatter, le tre Caravelle, diventano anche Wild, e sono dunque sostituibili, aumentando così le possibilità di vincita.
Ciascuna vincita inoltre può essere massimizzata grazie alla funzione Gamble, con la quale si può tentare il raddoppio: sulla schermata appare una mano di carte e il giocatore dovrà indovinare il colore di quella che verrà girata per vedere moltiplicata la sua puntata.
È disponibile anche una funzione Autoplay un po’ particolare: non è necessario impostare prima il numero dei giri, ma è sufficiente far partire il gioco con il pulsante “automatico” e cliccare invece su “stop” quando si vuole passare di nuovo alla modalità manuale.
Conclusioni
Pur non rappresentando una novità assoluta ma solo una versione migliorata di una slot già esistente, Columbus Deluxe si è rinnovata soprattutto per quanto riguarda la versatilità del gioco. Come il suo predecessore, mantiene la possibilità di spaziare da puntate molto basse a scommesse piuttosto consistenti (20 €), tuttavia l’offerta di gioco è nettamente superiore, con l’inserimento di funzionalità nuove e coinvolgenti.
Slot simili
Il tema delle scoperte e delle esplorazioni è stato ampiamente sviluppato nell’ambito delle slot machine da parte di diverse software house.
Playtech, per esempio, propone la slot The Discovery, in cui ad accompagnarci nell’esperienza di gioco sono Il Capitano e un’indigena della terra scoperta.
Molto suggestiva è anche Lucky Eggsplores della Microgaming, in cui i simboli tematici sono rappresentati da una goletta, il timone e l’immancabile mappa!
name: Columbus deluxe

message.content:
Columbus Deluxe: A Review for Experienced Gamblers

Columbus Deluxe is the improved version of the legendary Novomatic Columbus slot machine. The theme is the same with the same characters, and you sail here in a sea of bonuses and treasures to discover the New World. As an experienced gambler, you'll appreciate the modernized graphics and the traditional slot machine symbols representing the cards from 9 to Ace.

The symbols are centered on the theme of the New Continent discovery: Queen Isabella of Spain, the explorer's three ships, a gold necklace, a ship tree, and poker cards from 9 to Ace. The image of Christopher Columbus is the Wild symbol, replacing all other symbols, while also offering rich multipliers if it appears twice or more. It offers a jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline. The ships are the Scatter and activate the Free Spins Bonus.

To play, each symbol has a different value, starting from those that offer the lower winnings (playing cards), to those that pay more, represented by Queen Isabella D'Aragona and Christopher Columbus himself. Through Scatter symbols, you have access to free spins which become Wild, increasing the chances of winning. Each win can also be maximized through the Gamble function, where you can try to double your winnings by guessing the color of the upcoming card.

One unique feature is the Autoplay function. You don't need to set the number of spins beforehand, but simply start the game with the "automatic" button and click "stop" when you want to switch back to manual mode.

Overall, Columbus Deluxe may not be a new slot machine, but it has improved significantly in terms of game versatility. It offers a range of betting options from low to high with new and engaging features. If you enjoy the theme of discovery and exploration, other similar slots by software houses like Playtech's The Discovery or Microgaming's Lucky Eggsplores are also worth checking out.

rewritten_review_text:
Game symbols and theme

Columbus Deluxe has a New World discovery theme, featuring the same characters and symbols of its predecessor. The symbols include the queen of Spain, Columbus's three ships, a gold necklace, a ship tree, and playing cards from 9 to Ace. Christopher Columbus is the Wild symbol, replacing all others, while the ships are the Scatter and activate the Free Spins Bonus. The graphics are modernized but still present traditional slot machine symbols.

Wild and Scatter symbols

The Wild symbol in Columbus Deluxe is Christopher Columbus, which helps players score more wins by replacing other symbols. It also offers a jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline. The Scatter symbol is the ships, which activate the Free Spins Bonus and increase the chances of winning. Both symbols have unique features beneficial to players.

Jackpot and multipliers

Christopher Columbus offers a jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline, making it a valuable symbol. It also offers rich multipliers if it appears twice or more. The jackpot and multipliers add to the excitement of playing Columbus Deluxe and offer the potential for big wins.

Free Spins Bonus and Gamble function

Columbus Deluxe offers a Free Spins Bonus feature that is activated by the Scatter symbol. During the bonus, the Free Spins become Wild, increasing the player's chances of winning. Additionally, the Gamble function allows players to double their winnings by guessing the color of the upcoming card. These features enhance the game experience and offer players an opportunity to win more money.

Autoplay feature

Columbus Deluxe features an Autoplay function that allows players to start the game automatically, without having to set the number of spins beforehand. Players can switch back to manual mode by clicking on the 'stop' button. This feature adds to the convenience of playing the game and enables players to enjoy the game seamlessly.

expand_gameplay-features-and-wagering-op.headline: Gameplay Features and Wagering Options of Columbus Deluxe
expand_gameplay-features-and-wagering-op.content:
Columbus Deluxe is an online slot game that offers players an exciting gaming experience with its five reels and ten paylines. Players can place a minimum bet of €0.2 and a maximum bet of €20, making it an accessible game for both beginners and high rollers. The maximum payout of Columbus Deluxe is €100,000, which can be won by hitting the highest-paying symbols on the reels.

The game is also equipped with an Autoplay feature, which allows players to switch to automatic mode by pressing a button. This feature is particularly convenient for players who want to play the game without having to click on the spin button manually repeatedly. Players can stop the automatic mode and switch back to the manual mode whenever they want.

Another fantastic feature that Columbus Deluxe offers is the Gamble function. If you guess the color of the card that will be flipped, you can double your winnings. Columbus Deluxe features modernized graphics with a historical twist, as it retains classic slot machine features such as card symbols from nine to Ace. With Columbus Deluxe, players can enjoy a fun and thrilling gaming experience, accompanied by the chance to get some substantial rewards.

message.content:
{'headline': '

Theme and Symbols in Columbus Deluxe

', 'content': '

Columbus Deluxe, a Novomatic slot game, features exploration as its main theme. The symbols in the game revolve around the discovery of the New World, with important historical figures like Queen Isabella of Spain and Christopher Columbus himself. The game also features symbols like three caravels, a golden necklace, a ship’s tree and the standard poker cards (9 to Ace).

The Wild symbol in the game is Christopher Columbus, which can replace all other symbols and multiply winnings, up to a jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline. The Scatter symbol in the game is represented by caravels, which triggers the Free Spins bonus. Moreover, the game has an interesting Autoplay function, enabling players to switch between automatic and manual modes. Players can choose to play in manual mode, but by pressing a button, they can swap to automatic mode and keep playing until they again want to switch back to manual mode.

The overall design of the game is impressive, with the background depicting the calmness of the ocean and the ship sailing towards the new world, adding more excitement to the game. All the symbols are wonderfully designed and well integrated with the theme and atmosphere of the game. Players who have a penchant for exploration-themed slot games should try out Columbus Deluxe and experience the excitement of the discovery of the new world, with great bonus features and potential for big payouts.

'}

expand_game-symbols-and-theme.headline: Game symbols and theme
expand_game-symbols-and-theme.content:
Columbus Deluxe offers a journey through time with its New World discovery theme. The developers behind this game have taken great care in creating an atmosphere that captures the excitement of setting sail into unknown territory. The same characters and symbols from the original Columbus slot game are featured in this Deluxe version, including Columbus's three ships, the queen of Spain, a gold necklace, a ship tree, and playing cards from 9 to Ace. Each symbol offers a unique payout, and players can land big wins by matching up the characters and items from the voyage.

The Wild symbol is represented by Christopher Columbus himself, replacing other symbols on the reels to create winning combinations. This feature can help players to land regular wins. The Scatter symbol is the ships, which are crucial in triggering the Free Spins Bonus game. Three or more Scatter symbols on the reels activate the bonus, awarding players ten free spins. During this feature, the Wild symbol acts as a multiplier, increasing payouts and providing even greater winning potential.

Columbus Deluxe's graphics are modern and crisp, yet still manage to retain their classic slot machine charm. The overall game design immerses players in the theme, making it a visually appealing experience. This game is available to play on desktop and mobile devices, so players can enjoy the adventure anytime, anywhere. The attention to detail in the game's design, combined with its features and themes, make Columbus Deluxe an excellent choice for players looking for a rewarding and thrilling gaming experience.

expand_wild-and-scatter-symbols.headline: Explore the Wild and Scatter symbols in Columbus Deluxe
expand_wild-and-scatter-symbols.content:
The Wild symbol in Columbus Deluxe takes the form of Christopher Columbus, and it stands out for its ability to replace other symbols, thus increasing the player's chances of securing more wins. The Wild symbol is also connected to the game's highest payout of €100,000, which players can bag if it appears five times on a single payline. This makes Columbus Deluxe even more appealing to players who are searching for big payouts.

On the other hand, the Scatter symbol is the ships, and it comes with its unique benefits. When players get three or more of these symbols, they activate the coveted Free Spins Bonus feature. This feature lets players spin the reels for free, with all winnings being added to their total prize amount. It's a great way to extend gameplay and earn more profits. Additionally, the ships as Scatters also increase the chances of winning, as they don't have to appear in a winning payline to pay out.

To sum it up, the Wild and Scatter symbols in Columbus Deluxe are vital to the overall game experience and player's chances of winning. They both come with unique benefits that add to the game's appeal and excitement. Whether you're looking for big payouts or extended gameplay, the Wild and Scatter symbols are great features that make Columbus Deluxe one of the best slot games available online.

expand_jackpot-and-multipliers.headline: Jackpot and Multipliers
expand_jackpot-and-multipliers.content:
When it comes to winning big on the Columbus Deluxe slot game, the jackpot and multipliers are the key factors worth considering. The Christopher Columbus symbol offers a generous jackpot of €100,000 if it appears five times on a single payline, making it one of the most valuable symbols in the game.

In addition to the jackpot, the game offers rich multipliers when the Columbus symbol appears twice or more on the reels. These multipliers can boost your winnings by up to 5x, adding more excitement and thrill to the game.

While hitting the jackpot or the multiplier may not be an everyday occurrence, these features certainly add to the potential for big wins and make the Columbus Deluxe game even more enticing to play. So, if you're the kind of player who enjoys taking risks and aiming for the big rewards, this game is definitely worth considering!

expand_free-spins-bonus-and-gamble-funct.headline: Experience The Excitement: Columbus Deluxe Free Spins Bonus and Gamble Function
expand_free-spins-bonus-and-gamble-funct.content:
Columbus Deluxe is well-known for its engaging gameplay and lucrative features. One of the standout features of this slot game is the Free Spins Bonus. The bonus is activated by the scatter symbol, and during the feature, free spins become wild. This is an excellent opportunity to increase winning chances and it’s one of the reasons why players keep coming back.

Another exciting feature that adds to the thrill is the Gamble function. This feature allows players to double their winnings by correctly guessing the color of the upcoming card. This provides a perfect chance for players to take a calculated risk and boost their winnings. The addition of these features in Columbus Deluxe enhances the game experience and offers players an opportunity to win big.

The combination of Free Spins Bonus and Gamble function is an added advantage that makes Columbus Deluxe a much sought after game among slot enthusiasts. It’s no surprise that this game continues to be one of the most popular games in the online casino world. With the ability to win big and the engaging gameplay experience, Columbus Deluxe is a game that can provide hours of excitement and entertainment!

expand_autoplay-feature.headline: Autoplay Feature
expand_autoplay-feature.content:
One of the standout features of Columbus Deluxe is its Autoplay function, which allows players to start the game automatically without having to manually set the number of spins beforehand. Instead, players can simply determine their desired bet level, hit the Autoplay button, and the game will do the rest. This feature is particularly useful for those who are looking to play the game for a longer period of time or who are simply looking for a more relaxed gaming experience.

Whether you are busy doing something else or simply prefer to sit back and watch the reels spin, Columbus Deluxe's Autoplay feature is a fantastic addition that adds to the convenience of playing the game. The ease-of-use and seamless gameplay make it a popular choice for all types of players, and it's no surprise that it has become one of the standout features of the game.

faq.question: What is the theme of Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: Columbus Deluxe has a New World discovery theme featuring traditional slot machine symbols and characters like Christopher Columbus, the queen of Spain, and Columbus's three ships.

faq.question: What are the Wild and Scatter symbols in Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: The Wild symbol is Christopher Columbus, which replaces other symbols and offers a jackpot of €100,000. The Scatter symbol is the ships that activate the Free Spins Bonus and increase the chances of winning.

faq.question: What is the maximum jackpot amount in Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: The maximum jackpot amount in Columbus Deluxe is €100,000, which can be won by landing five Christopher Columbus symbols on a single payline.

faq.question: What are multipliers and how do they work in Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: Christopher Columbus offers rich multipliers if it appears twice or more, which increases the player's chance of winning big.

faq.question: What is the Free Spins Bonus and how is it activated in Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: The Free Spins Bonus is a feature activated by the Scatter symbol and increases the player's chances of winning by making the Free Spins Wild.

faq.question: What is the Gamble function in Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: The Gamble function allows players to double their winnings by guessing the color of the upcoming card, offering an opportunity to win more money.

faq.question: Does Columbus Deluxe have an Autoplay feature?
faq.answer: Yes, Columbus Deluxe features an Autoplay function that allows players to start the game automatically, without having to set the number of spins beforehand.

faq.question: Can players switch back to manual mode from Autoplay in Columbus Deluxe?
faq.answer: Yes, players can switch back to manual mode from Autoplay in Columbus Deluxe by clicking on the 'stop' button.

html:
Play Columbus Deluxe for Free - Discover the New World

Meta description: Read our review of Columbus Deluxe slot game: Pros and cons, Wild symbol, Jackpot, Free Spins Bonus, and Autoplay. Play free and discover the New World.

Game symbols and theme

Columbus Deluxe offers a journey through time with its New World discovery theme. The developers behind this game have taken great care in creating an atmosphere that captures the excitement of setting sail into unknown territory. The same characters and symbols from the original Columbus slot game are featured in this Deluxe version, including Columbus's three ships, the queen of Spain, a gold necklace, a ship tree, and playing cards from 9 to Ace. Each symbol offers a unique payout, and players can land big wins by matching up the characters and items from the voyage.

FAQ

What is the theme of Columbus Deluxe?

Columbus Deluxe has a New World discovery theme featuring traditional slot machine symbols and characters like Christopher Columbus, the queen of Spain, and Columbus's three ships.

What are the Wild and Scatter symbols in Columbus Deluxe?

The Wild symbol is Christopher Columbus, which replaces other symbols and offers a jackpot of €100,000. The Scatter symbol is the ships that activate the Free Spins Bonus and increase the chances of winning.

What is the maximum jackpot amount in Columbus Deluxe?

The maximum jackpot amount in Columbus Deluxe is €100,000, which can be won by landing five Christopher Columbus symbols on a single payline.

What are multipliers and how do they work in Columbus Deluxe?

Christopher Columbus offers rich multipliers if it appears twice or more, which increases the player's chance of winning big.

What is the Free Spins Bonus and how is it activated in Columbus Deluxe?

The Free Spins Bonus is a feature activated by the Scatter symbol and increases the player's chances of winning by making the Free Spins Wild.

What is the Gamble function in Columbus Deluxe?

The Gamble function allows players to double their winnings by guessing the color of the upcoming card, offering an opportunity to win more money.

Does Columbus Deluxe have an Autoplay feature?

Yes, Columbus Deluxe features an Autoplay function that allows players to start the game automatically, without having to set the number of spins beforehand.

Can players switch back to manual mode from Autoplay in Columbus Deluxe?

Yes, players can switch back to manual mode from Autoplay in Columbus Deluxe by clicking on the 'stop' button.
